name: Joseph Phelps Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: A wine of great energy, length, and finesse, 2018 Cabernet Sauvignon opens with floral notes, cedar and pencil shavings followed by ripe blackberry, cassis and red currant jam.

name: Adrianna Vineyard Malbec 2016
description: A wine from Fortuna Terrae which means luck of the land in Latin. Because of the freshness imparted by the deep soils and high altitude, the wines of Fortuna Terrae have optimal acidity and delicate flower aromas.

name: Wayfarer Vineyard Pinot Noir 2014
description: This ruby-hued wine begins with delicate floral notes that lead into bright red fruit aromas with hints of powdered cocoa and the suggestion of an ocean breeze.

name: Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc 2019
description: Vibrant and expressive in the glass, with notes of passionfruit, white peach, kaffir lime and citrus, this intense and concentrated wine is Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc at its best.

name: Grgich Hills Estate Chardonnay 2016
description: This wine opens with fresh lemon and orange aromas followed by more subtle notes of lemon zest and a hue of marzipan.
